item.description:
This is a must see! Want to see a romantic comedy set in beautiful Roma, then come see this film. Directed by Woody Allen and featuring a star studded cast. I would like to get everyone together for this one. It will be showing for 4 days.

  • General Admission: $9.00
  • Admission with Friends of Cinestudio Card: $7.00
  • Admission for Seniors over 62: $7.00
  • Students from any school, with student ID: $7.00

Directions: http://www.cinestudio.org/directions

Trailer

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WIbYqxqtP38

When: Wed, September 19, 7:30pm –
Where: Cinestudio (map)
Description(US, 2012) Written and directed by Woody Allen. Cast: Woody Allen, Jesse Eisenberg, Penélope Cruz, Alec Baldwin, Judy Davis, Roberto Benigni, Allison Pill. Celebrated as a New York director whose love for his city is felt in every frame, Woody Allen’s recent European tour has inspired a new crop of light-hearted movies: Match Point (in London), Vicky Christina Barcelona, and Midnight in Paris. Allen’s Roman holiday is a delight that revels in four intertwined stories of Americans and Italians bewitched by the Eternal City. While the entire ensemble cast is flawless, we have to mention Jesse Eisenberg (The Social Network) as an architecture student tempted by infidelity, Penélope Cruz (All About My Mother) as a classy strumpet who visits the wrong man, and the 76-year-old director himself as a retired opera director who travels to Rome prepared to dislike his daughter’s Italian fiancé. “A romantic comedy devoted to dreamers and seekers. The only crime imaginable in this movie is the unwillingness to take a chance.” - David Denby, New Yorker.
item.name: Film "To Rome with Love" - Hartford, CT Wed. 9/19
